name: Loading {VAL}
description: This weapon must be reloaded after expending the magazine. Mechs can reload with Stabilize and some systems.

name: MK.{VAL}
description: This weapon has been upgraded from its base version dealing either more damage having other effects ect.

name: Enigmatic Technology
description: This equipment is derived from lost or incomprehensible advanced technology, unable to be maintained or replicated, with effects that defy current understanding.
